main event: A witness observed a helicopter pulling an advertising sign with flashing lights in a sequence.
interesting points: The object was described as having eight lights that flashed in a specific sequence with a constant light above them,The sighting took place at an altitude of approximately 1000-1500 feet,The object was reported to cross overhead at the speed of a light plane,The witness stated that the lights emitted a glow and appeared larger than a standard aircraft,There was no physical evidence collected at the scene.
